ing: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen baby lima beans
des: "Baby lima beans are steamed in chicken broth. This is a very tasty lima bean recipe that is also low in fat."
ins: Heat a large saucepan over medium heat, and spray with cooking spray. Saute onions until soft and translucent. Pour in chicken broth, and bring to a boil. Add lima beans, and enough water just to cover. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes, until beans are tender.
